mapper.select: SELECT id, startdate, enddate, content, color, deldate, schedule_num FROM schedule_user WHERE id = #{id} and deldate is NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_user( id, startdate, enddate, content, schedule_num )VALUES( #{id}, to_date(#{startdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{enddate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{content}, s_u_seq.nextval )
